Based on your preference cues for family-friendly movies with a圣诞主题, I would recommend the following two movies:

1. "A Christmas Carol" (1843) - This classic holiday film tells the story of Ebenezer Scrooge, who is initially indifferent to others' suffering and happiness but eventually learns the true meaning of Christmas. The film features a star-studded cast including actors like Charles Dickens himself as the narrator and actor/director Frank Capra as the director.

2. "Total Recall" (1990) - This sci-fi action film tells the story of Douglas Quaid, a factory worker living in Mars who suddenly starts questioning his reality after visiting Rekall, a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led. The film features an all-star cast including actors like Arnold Schwarzenegger as the main character Douglas Quaid, actor/director Steven Spielberg as the director and actress Sigourney Weaver as the co-writer.
